amendment.description: To authorize, with an offset, an additional $1,000,000 for procurement for the Marine Corps for General Property for Field Medical Equipment for the Rapid Intravenous (IV) Infusion Pump.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1329 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1329 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To authorize, with an offset, an additional $1,000,000 for procurement for the Marine Corps for General Property for Field Medical Equipment for the Rapid Intravenous (IV) Infusion Pump.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1329 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1329 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
